biography.bio: Helmut Qualtinger was born on October 8, 1928 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor and writer, known for The Name of the Rose (1986), Das falsche Gewicht (1971) and Der Herr Karl (1961). He was married to Vera Borek and Seidler, Leomare. He died on September 29, 1986 in Vienna.
biography.name: Helmut Qualtinger

biography.bio: Agnes Fink was born on December 14, 1919 in Frankfurt am Main, Germany. She was an actress, known for Das falsche Gewicht (1971), The Sternstein Manor (1976) and Der gläserne Himmel (1987). She was married to Bernhard Wicki. She died on October 28, 1994 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Agnes Fink

biography.bio: Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic was born on June 5, 1933 in Koracica near Mladenovac, Serbia, Yugoslavia. He was an actor, known for Srecni ljudi (1993), Ice (2012) and Joli village, jolie flamme (1996). He was married to Julijana 'Lula' Zivojinovic. He died on May 22, 2016 in Belgrade, Serbia.
biography.name: Velimir 'Bata' Zivojinovic

biography.bio: Evelyn Opela was born on February 4, 1945 in Varnsdorf, Czechoslovakia. She is an actress, known for Das falsche Gewicht (1971), Der Mann ohne Schatten (1996) and Nasrin oder Die Kunst zu träumen (1972). She was previously married to Helmut Ringelmann.
biography.name: Evelyn Opela

biography.bio: Kurt Sowinetz was born on February 26, 1928 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor, known for The Fool from Vienna (1982), Das falsche Gewicht (1971) and Die Hinrichtung (1966). He died on January 28, 1991 in Vienna.
biography.name: Kurt Sowinetz

biography.bio: Anna Báró was born on October 8, 1920 in Bajmok, Hungary. She was an actress, known for Das falsche Gewicht (1971), Anna (1958) and Csutak és a szürke ló (1961). She died on October 23, 1994 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Anna Báró

biography.bio: Gottfried Kumpf is an actor, known for Das falsche Gewicht (1971), Situation (1974) and Ich will leben (1976).
biography.name: Gottfried Kumpf

biography.bio: István Iglódi was born on April 29, 1944 in Magyarbóly, Hungary. He was an actor and director, known for Trotta (1971), Nem várok holnapig... (1967) and Imposztorok (1969). He died on December 2, 2009 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: István Iglódi

biography.bio: Johannes Schaaf was born on April 7, 1933 in Stuttgart, Germany. He is an actor and director, known for Momo (1986), Trotta (1971) and Tattoo (1967). He has been married to Stella Kleindienst since February 15, 1984. They have one child. He was previously married to Rosemarie Fendel.
biography.name: Johannes Schaaf

biography.bio: Rudolf Strobl was born on March 9, 1927 in Innsbruck, Austria. He was an actor, known for Familie Leitner (1958), Das falsche Gewicht (1971) and Keine Angst Liebling, ich pass schon auf (1970). He died on September 12, 1997 in Vienna, Austria.
biography.name: Rudolf Strobl

biography.bio: Wladimir Rosenbaum is an actor, known for Das falsche Gewicht (1971).
biography.name: Wladimir Rosenbaum

biography.bio: Rosa Markus is an actress, known for Das falsche Gewicht (1971).
biography.name: Rosa Markus

biography.placeOfBirth: Magyarlóna, Austria-Hungary [now Luna de Sus, Romania]
biography.bio: Manyi Kiss was born on March 12, 1911 in Magyarlóna, Austria-Hungary. She was an actress, known for The Lady from Constantinople (1969), Mici néni két élete (1963) and Merry-Go-Round (1956). She died on March 29, 1971 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Manyi Kiss

biography.bio: Sándor Siménfalvy was born on July 9, 1892 in Szenice, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Les dix mille soleils (1967), Silence et cri (1968) and The Brute (1961). He died on December 24, 1988 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Sándor Siménfalvy

biography.bio: Ladislaus Ferencz is an actor, known for Das falsche Gewicht (1971).
biography.name: Ladislaus Ferencz
